@markwilkinson1 @Riverflies @EnvAgency @FriendsRib This highlights the difference between EA monitoring and riverfly. EA monitoring is more detailed but less regular to categorise the longer term health of a stretch of river. Riverfly is a great tool for less detailed but more frequent monitoring to pick up pollution incidents.
